page.title: 13 IMPROVING THE AREA.
page.content:
Of the 129 people questioned 102,(79%) said that the amenities of the area were reasonable to good.
{Ways of improving the amenities.
The most frequent suggestion was for a much improved public transport system.
The second most frequent suggestion was for more facilities for the children,particularly the youth of the area.
For the block,excluding Saltwood,many people stated there was a need for a local doctor and a local chemist shop.
Many suggestions ,in fact,concerned problems outside the block and the top one was a plea for more large shops like Littlewoods or B.H.S.
